SELECT METHOD_NM AS conectMethod , COALESCE(SUM(CREAT_CO),0) AS creatCo , COALESCE(SUM(UPDT_CO),0) AS updtCo , COALESCE(SUM(RDCNT),0) AS inqireCo , COALESCE(SUM(DELETE_CO),0) AS deleteCo , COALESCE(SUM(OUTPT_CO),0) AS outptCo , COALESCE(SUM(ERROR_CO),0) AS errorCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) AS statsDate
, 0 AS statsCo FROM LETTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}
AND SRVC_NM LIKE '%' || #{detailStatsKind} || '%'
GROUP BY conectMethod, statsDate, statsCo ORDER BY statsDate

SELECT COUNT(CONECT_ID) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) AS statsDate
, '' AS conectMethod , 0 AS creatCo , 0 AS updtCo , 0 AS inqireCo , 0 AS deleteCo , 0 AS outptCo , 0 AS errorCo FROM LETTNLOGINLOG WHERE 1=1
AND CONECT_ID = #{detailStatsKind}
AND to_char(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} GROUP BY statsDate, conectMethod, creatCo, updtCo, inqireCo, deleteCo, outptCo, errorCo ORDER BY statsDate
